quote: He who kneels before God can stand before anyone.
author: Unknown

quote: Prayer is the key of the morning and the bolt of the evening.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Worry does not empty tomorrow of its sorrow, it empties today of its strength.
author: Corrie Ten Boom

quote: When I am afraid, I put my trust in you.
author: Psalm 56:3

quote: You will seek me and find me when you seek me with all your heart.
author: Jeremiah 29:13

quote: I sought the Lord, and he answered me; he delivered me from all my fears.
author: Psalm 34:4

quote: Commit to the Lord whatever you do, and he will establish your plans.
author: Proverbs 16:3

quote: Even though I walk through the darkest valley, I will fear no evil, for you are with me.
author: Psalm 23:4

quote: He must increase, but I must decrease.
author: John 3:30

quote: Blessed is she who has believed that the Lord would fulfill his promises to her.
author: Luke 1:45

quote: Therefore encourage one another and build each other up.
author: 1 Thessalonians 5:11

quote: The name of the Lord is a strong tower; the righteous run to it and are safe.
author: Proverbs 18:10

quote: Rejoice in hope, be patient in tribulation, be constant in prayer.
author: Romans 12:12

quote: Let your light shine before others, that they may see your good deeds and glorify your Father in heaven.
author: Matthew 5:16

quote: A cheerful heart is good medicine, but a crushed spirit dries up the bones.
author: Proverbs 17:22

quote: He gives power to the weak and strength to the powerless.
author: Isaiah 40:29

quote: Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.
author: Matthew 11:28

quote: The light shines in the darkness, and the darkness has not overcome it.
author: John 1:5

quote: My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.
author: 2 Corinthians 12:9

quote: Set your minds on things above, not on earthly things.
author: Colossians 3:2

quote: Do not conform to the pattern of this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind.
author: Romans 12:2

quote: Let us not grow weary in doing good, for at the proper time we will reap a harvest if we do not give up.
author: Galatians 6:9

quote: Taste and see that the Lord is good; blessed is the one who takes refuge in him.
author: Psalm 34:8

quote: Create in me a pure heart, O God, and renew a steadfast spirit within me.
author: Psalm 51:10

quote: Be kind and compassionate to one another, forgiving each other, just as in Christ God forgave you.
author: Ephesians 4:32

quote: Faith does not make things easyâ€”it makes them possible.
author: Luke 1:37

quote: Where God guides, He provides.
author: Isaiah 58:11

quote: God has perfect timing; never early, never late.
author: Unknown

quote: The will of God will never take you where the grace of God will not protect you.
author: Unknown

quote: Delight yourself in the Lord, and he will give you the desires of your heart.
author: Psalm 37:4

quote: Fear not, for I have redeemed you; I have summoned you by name; you are mine.
author: Isaiah 43:1
